00025 config_file::config_file(string name)
00026 {
00027     new error(INFO_L,"New Config File: "+name);
00028     //should do error checking on `name`
00029     filename=name;
00030 }
00031 
00032 /*
00033     Ita bad Practice to create more than one LUA_State
00034     it sould be created one passed around function to function
00035     via a refrence ...

00038 int config_file::get_int(string var_name)
00039 {
00040     new error(INFO_L,"Config File `"+filename+"`: getting `"+var_name+"`");
00041 
00042     int number=0;
00043 
00044     lua_State *L = lua_open();
00045     luaL_openlibs(L);
00046 
00047     if (!luaL_dofile(L,filename.c_str())) //execute config file
00048     {
00049         lua_getglobal(L,var_name.c_str());
00050         if (!lua_isnumber(L, -1))
00051         {
00052             new error(WARNING,filename+": `"+var_name+"` should be a number");
00053         }
00054         else
00055             number=(int)lua_tonumber(L, -1);
00056     }
00057     else
00058     {
00059         new error(WARNING,"cannot execute "+filename);
00060     }
00061 
00062     lua_close(L);
00063 
00064     return number;
00065 }
00066

00094 string config_file::get_string(string var_name)
00095 {
00096     string data_string="";
00097 
00098     lua_State *L = lua_open();
00099     luaL_openlibs(L);
00100 
00101     if (!luaL_dofile(L,filename.c_str())) //execute config file
00102     {
00103         lua_getglobal(L,var_name.c_str());
00104         if (!lua_isstring(L, -1))
00105         {
00106             new error(WARNING,filename+": `"+var_name+"` should be a string");
00107         }
00108         else
00109             data_string=lua_tolstring(L, -1,NULL);
00110     }
00111     else
00112     {
00113         new error(WARNING,"cannot execute "+filename);
00114     }
00115 
00116     lua_close(L);
00117 
00118     return data_string;
00119 }
